text: "Paparazzi" is a song by American pop singer Lady Gaga from her first album, The Fame (2008). It was released May 15, 2009. The song managed to reach number one in Germany; the top five in Australia, New Zealand, Canada, and the UK; and the top ten in the US. It became Gaga's fourth consecutive number-one song on Billboard's Pop Songs airplay chart. On February 29, 2016, the Recording Industry Association of America certified "Paparazzi" 4× Platinum for sales and streams equal to four million copies in the United States. == Charts == Weekly chart performance for "Paparazzi" Chart (2009–10) Peak position ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2009) Rank Canada (Canadian Hot 100) 18 US Radio Songs (Billboard) 52 == References == Category:2009 songs Category:Lady Gaga songs Category:Dance-pop songs
title: Paparazzi (song)
